meanings.sent1: The misunions between the puzzle pieces made it impossible to complete the picture.
meanings.sent2: The misunions of the train tracks caused delays in the train schedule.
meanings.sent3: The misunions of the socks in the laundry led to some mismatched pairs.
meanings.sent4: The misunions in the choir disrupted the harmony of the performance.
meanings.sent5: The misunions of the ingredients in the recipe resulted in a strange-tasting dish.

meanings.definition: Misunions: the act of misuniting or being misunited
meanings.sent1: The misunions of the broken vase made it impossible to repair.
meanings.sent2: The misunions in the construction caused the building to collapse.
meanings.sent3: The misunions of the jigsaw puzzle pieces created a confusing image.
meanings.sent4: The misunions in the team's strategy led to their defeat in the game.
meanings.sent5: The misunions of the threads in the fabric resulted in a torn garment.
